SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :SET &UC4RB_SQLPLUS_CONN# = "" :IF &UC4RB_DB_USE_ADMIN_PRIV# = "No" : IF &UC4RB_DB_HOST# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQLPLUS_CONN# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQLPLUS_CONN#, "@&UC4RB_DB_HOST#") : IF &UC4RB_DB_PORT# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQLPLUS_CONN# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQLPLUS_CONN#, ":&UC4RB_DB_PORT#") : ENDIF : SET &UC4RB_SQLPLUS_CONN# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQLPLUS_CONN#, "/") : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_DB_SERVICE# <> "" : IF &UC4RB_DB_HOST# = "" : SET &UC4RB_SQLPLUS_CONN# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQLPLUS_CONN#, "@") : ENDIF : SET &UC4RB_SQLPLUS_CONN# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQLPLUS_CONN#, "&UC4RB_DB_SERVICE#") : ENDIF
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Connect with Username/Password at &UC4RB_SQLPLUS_CONN#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
: IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" echo &UC4RB_DB_COMMAND# | &UC4RB_DB_SQLPLUS_FULL_PATH# &UC4RB_DB_USER#^/\"%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%\"&UC4RB_SQLPLUS_CONN# : ELSE echo "&UC4RB_DB_COMMAND#" | &UC4RB_DB_SQLPLUS_FULL_PATH# &UC4RB_DB_USER#\/\"$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD\"&UC4RB_SQLPLUS_CONN# : ENDIF
:ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SQLPLUS_CONN# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQLPLUS_CONN#, "/ AS &UC4RB_DB_USE_ADMIN_PRIV#") : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Connect as &UC4RB_DB_USE_ADMIN_PRIV#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
: IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" echo &UC4RB_DB_COMMAND# | &UC4RB_DB_SQLPLUS_FULL_PATH# &UC4RB_SQLPLUS_CONN# : ELSE echo "&UC4RB_DB_COMMAND#" | &UC4RB_DB_SQLPLUS_FULL_PATH# &UC4RB_SQLPLUS_CONN# : ENDIF
:ENDIF
